text: Back Home and Broke is a 1922 American silent comedy movie directed by Alfred E. Green and starring Thomas Meighan, Lila Lee, Frederick Burton, Cyril Ring, Larry Wheat, Eddie Borden, Maude Turner Gordon. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures and is a lost movie. ==Other websites== * * Category:1922 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by Alfred E. Green Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: Back Home and Broke
